methods.name: public void updateInterfaceState(IpServer who, int state, int lastError)
methods.comment:
* Notify that |who| has changed its tethering state.
         *
         * @param who the calling instance of IpServer
         * @param state one of STATE_*
         * @param lastError one of TetheringManager.TETHER_ERROR_*

methods.name: public void updateLinkProperties(IpServer who, LinkProperties newLp)
methods.comment:
* Notify that |who| has new LinkProperties.
         *
         * @param who the calling instance of IpServer
         * @param newLp the new LinkProperties to report

methods.name: public void dhcpLeasesChanged()
methods.comment: * Notify that the DHCP leases changed in one of the IpServers.

methods.name: public void requestEnableTethering(int tetheringType, boolean enabled)
methods.comment:
* Request Tethering change.
         *
         * @param tetheringType the downstream type of this IpServer.
         * @param enabled enable or disable tethering.

methodNames: public void updateInterfaceState(IpServer who, int state, int lastError)
